content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a civil suit involving multiple parties the court known as the tribunal massa made a final resolution in favor of vmrvf awarding them a sum of €2704024 dell was also awarded a sum of €1081830 additionally a professional named avv roberta catapiani was granted €650487 ap and al were assigned the same amount of €1081830 the court ordered the closure of an escrow account and instructed de to pay vmrvf the remaining sum of €1296871 plus legal interest de was also ordered to pay dell the same amount furthermore de was condemned to repay vmrvf and dell the costs of the litigation totaling €278013 each the court referred to various articles of the civil code in its decision addressing collation imputation donation regarding marriage failure to delay performance and the use of common things the court based its decision on a previous judgment and the division of property among coowners the court allocated debts among the sharers of the property and ordered de to pay occupation indemnity the court also determined and divided the costs of the litigation among the parties involved this final ruling was made on february 21 2017
